title: Speke Resort & Conference Centre
address: Plot 94, 411 & 412, Wavamunno Road, Munyonyo, Kampala, Uganda
description: A luxurious lakeside resort on Lake Victoria with 335 rooms, restaurants, an Olympic-size pool, marina, equestrian centre, and spa. Hosts major international events.

title: Wonder World Amusement Park
description: A vibrant amusement park with roller coasters, a pirate ship, water slides, and a mini train. A top family destination in Kampala.

title: Cafe Javas
description: A popular Ugandan café chain known for great food, consistent service, and a modern café experience. A go-to for breakfast, lunch, and meetings.

title: Skyz Hotel Naguru by Protea
address: Plot 1, Water Lane, Naguru Hill, Kampala, Uganda
description: An upscale hotel with city views, rooftop bar, event facilities, and a luxurious environment perfect for business or leisure.

title: Giraffe Manor
address: Gogo Falls Road, Langata, Nairobi, Kenya
description: A unique boutique hotel where giraffes roam the property and interact with guests during breakfast. Set on historic grounds with only 10 rooms.

title: Two Rivers Mall & Theme Park
address: Limuru Road & Northern Bypass, Ruaka, Nairobi, Kenya
description: East Africa’s largest shopping mall with an adjacent theme park, offering family rides, dining, and major retail outlets.

title: Carnivore Restaurant
description: Iconic all-you-can-eat meat restaurant offering a wide variety of game and local meats in a lively setting.

title: Sarova Whitesands Beach Resort & Spa
address: Malindi Road, Bamburi Beach, Mombasa, Kenya
description: A luxury beachfront resort offering spa treatments, water sports, and family-friendly hospitality on Kenya’s Indian Ocean coast.
